# Pastel
> Last Modified: 18.05.2024

## File Purpose

This file provides styles for pastel elements in modern UIs. It includes various components and utility classes optimized for performance and accessibility.

## CSS Utility Classes

### Base Classes

#### `.theme-pastel`
- Description: Styling for theme pastel elements
- Uses: --color-primary, --color-primary-hover, --color-primary-active
- Creates: Styled theme pastel appearance

#### `.theme-pastel`
- Description: Styling for theme pastel elements
- Uses: --color-text, --color-text-muted, --color-text-light
- Creates: Styled theme pastel appearance

#### `.dark-mode`
- Description: Styling for dark mode elements
- Uses: --color-text, --color-text-muted, --color-text-light
- Creates: Styled dark mode appearance

## CSS Custom Properties (Variables)

### Color Variables
- `--color-primary-50` - Default: `var(--color-pink-50)`

## Responsive / Media Behavior

### `@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark)`
- Adjusts layout and styling for specific screen conditions
